name: Ayton Game
description:
The game takes place on a planet called Ayton – a planet rich in minerals and rich in life. The players play as the Aytonians who live on this area. In the game, you will be required to play the role of a 'Waterman', which is a father of six children and one of the guardians of the planet. As part of being a parent, you will be able to raise your children, house them, and generally be part of the life on your planet.
You will be able to download the game via the itch.io website for $29.99.
